posts.post_title: For Sale: T204 Ramly Bancroft (Blank Back) SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling a SGC AUT (because of a small piece of tape on back) Frank Bancroft with the very tough Blank back. Tape in NOT holding a rip or tear together.

SOLD
